data.comment: The match is underway in Mainz.
Throw-in for Bremen in the half of Mainz.
In the minute 2, Guido Winkmann signals a Bremen throw-in in Mainz's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Bremen in Mainz.
Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick Bremen.
Guido Winkmann awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Bremen.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Bremen push forward at Opel Arena and Josh Sargent gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Mainz defence.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Guido Winkmann awards Mainz a goal kick.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Mainz in the half of Bremen.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 16, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Robin Quaison of Mainz gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Bremen at Opel Arena.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Throw-in for Bremen in the half of Mainz.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
In the minute 19, Mainz have a dangerous throw-in.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Mainz.
Free kick for Bremen in the half of Mainz.
In the minute 21, Mainz have a goal kick.
Free kick Bremen.
In Mainz Bremen drive forward through Maximilian Eggestein. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Guido Winkmann signals a Bremen throw-in in Mainz's half.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Edimilson Fernandes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Mainz.
In the minute 30, Guido Winkmann awards Bremen a goal kick.
Throw-in Bremen.
Marco Friedl of Bremen smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 32, Bremen have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
In Mainz Mainz attack through Robin Quaison. The finish is off target, however.
Bremen have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Bremen.
Guido Winkmann awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Bremen's Yuya Osako gets in a shot on goal at Opel Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Mainz are coming forward and Pierre Kunde gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
In the minute 41, Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Mainz.
Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Throw-in for Bremen close to the penalty box.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 45, Guido Winkmann blows to end the first-half.
Guido Winkmann has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Bremen at Opel Arena.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Bremen.
Maximilian Eggestein for Bremen has been booked by Guido Winkmann and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Bremen at Opel Arena.
Omer Toprak is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Omer Toprak, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Milos Veljkovic is the substitute for Bremen.
In the minute 55, Can Mainz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bremen's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Bremen in the half of Mainz.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kevin Mohwald.
Kevin Mohwald has recovered and rejoins the match in Mainz.
In the minute 61, Bremen have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Guido Winkmann signals a Bremen throw-in in Mainz's half.
Bremen's Kevin Mohwald gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Mainz have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Mainz to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Guido Winkmann signals a throw-in for Mainz, close to Bremen's area.
Jan Moritz Lichte is making the team's first substitution at Opel Arena with Leandro Martins replacing Pierre Kunde.
In the minute 70, Mainz's Edimilson Fernandes breaks free at Opel Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 72, Romano Schmid for the away team is judged to be offside.
The away team have replaced Yuya Osako with Tahith Chong. This is the second substitution made today by Florian Kohfeldt.
Free kick Bremen.
In the minute 73, Leandro Martins (Mainz) gets a yellow card.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Bremen.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bremen close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Bremen.
Guido Winkmann awards Mainz a goal kick.
Guido Winkmann signals a Mainz throw-in in Bremen's half.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
The home team replace Kevin Stoger with Danny Latza.
Jan Moritz Lichte (Mainz) is making a third substitution, with Karim Onisiwo replacing Jean-Philippe Mateta.
In the minute 81, Marco Friedl for Bremen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 82, Moussa Niakhate (Mainz) gets booked by Guido Winkmann, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
In the minute 85, Guido Winkmann awards the away team a throw-in.
Dong Won Ji is on a sub for Edimilson Fernandes for Mainz.
Eren Dinkci is replacing Romano Schmid for Bremen at Opel Arena.
In the minute 87, Mainz have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Bremen.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 89, Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Bremen.
Bremen to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Throw-in Mainz.
Mainz's Karim Onisiwo misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Bremen.
Eren Dinkci scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Tahith Chong instrumental with a fine assist.
At Opel Arena, Christian Gross has been yellow-carded for the away team.
